column1: {"id":112802911,"title":"药明康德半年报解读（2018）","description":"咱们闲言少叙，直接上半年报了 2018年上半年应收同比增长20.29%, 扣非净利润同比增长32.30%,药明康德是刚上市的，没有任何国外网的年报，只有招股说明书，所以无从比较，但从凯莱英的半年报做个同行对比来看，药明康德的业绩算可以的。 下面是业绩变动因素： 公司的主营业务可以分为合同研发服务...","target":"/3237139935/112802911","user":{"id":3237139935,"profile":"/3237139935","description":"公众号:进入击球区 {"id":112810592,"title":"刘煜辉：通货膨胀的宏观体验","description":"作者：天风证券首席经济学家刘煜辉 宏观是研究什么？归列为三大问题。 第一是经济长期增长的源泉是什么，就是我们常讲的供给侧、生产函数、潜在增长。 第二是经济波动和周期，就是需求端，短期由货币信用购买力所实现的经济活动，我们熟悉的三驾马车。需求经常会和供给（潜在增长）发生偏离，这就...","target":"/2140400147/112810592","user":{"id":2140400147,"profile":"/2140400147","description":"","screen_name":"天风证券研究所","profile_image_url":"community/20173/1492583616098-1500951416904.jpg,community/20173/1492583616098-1500951416904.jpg!180x180.png,community/20173/1492583616098-1500951416904.jpg!50x50.png,community/20173/1492583616098-1500951416904.jpg!30x30.png","photo_domain":"http://xavatar.imedao.com/"},"promotion":false,"answers":null,"tag":null,"card":null,"source":"雪球","score":null,"reply_count":0,"retweet_count":1,"topic_title":"刘煜辉：通货膨胀的宏观体验","topic_desc":"作者：天风证券首席经济学家刘煜辉 宏观是研究什么？归列为...","topic_symbol":null,"topic_pic":null,"topic_pic_hd":null,"pic_type":0,"first_pic":"https://xqimg.imedao.com/1657a10d2bf25e4d3fc7650c.jpg!186x186.jpg","pic_size":{"width":2,"height":1,"qrcode":false},"pic":"https://xqimg.imedao.com/1657a10d2bf25e4d3fc7650c.jpg!345x210.webp,https://xqimg.imedao.com/1657a0b842025f9d3fc941be.png!345x210.webp","view_count":14743,"created_at":1535351041000,"link_stock_desc":null,"link_stock_symbol":null,"strategy_id":0,"feedback":null,"quote_cards":null,"retweeted_status":null}

{"id":112809330,"title":"自如是如何赚钱的","description":"年初，自如获得40亿元的A轮融资。在长租公寓行业，这是规模最大的一笔融资，被称为“自如的成人礼”，彼时，政策支持，资本追逐，媒体追捧。 仅仅7个月后，自如被推向风口浪尖。 时任我爱我家的副总裁胡景晖称，以自如、蛋壳公寓为代表的长租公寓运营商，为扩大规模，以高于正常价格的20%到40%争...","target":"/1333325987/112809330","user":{"id":1333325987,"profile":"/gelonghui","description":"格隆汇APP是海外投研第一平台，我们宗旨是【全球视野，下注中国】。在这里，我们分享和探讨港股、美国中概股之投资线索、投资机会与投资心得。更多详细分析可关注【港股那点事】微信公众号hkstocks或访问我们的官网www.gelonghui.com。","screen_name":"格隆汇","profile_image_url":"community/20154/1432881066206-1432881100357.jpg,community/20154/1432881066206-1432881100357.jpg!180x180.png,community/20154/1432881066206-1432881100357.jpg!50x50.png,community/20154/1432881066206-1432881100357.jpg!30x30.png","photo_domain":"http://xavatar.imedao.com/"},"promotion":false,"answers":null,"tag":null,"card":null,"source":"雪球","score":null,"reply_count":3,"retweet_count":3,"topic_title":"自如是如何赚钱的","topic_desc":"年初，自如获得40亿元的A轮融资。在长租公寓行业，这是规模...","topic_symbol":null,"topic_pic":null,"topic_pic_hd":null,"pic_type":0,"first_pic":"https://xqimg.imedao.com/16579ff4e7125ded3fbe5bd5.png!186x186.jpg","pic_size":{"width":2,"height":1,"qrcode":false},"pic":"https://xqimg.imedao.com/16579ff4e7125ded3fbe5bd5.png!345x210.webp,https://xqimg.imedao.com/16579ff4e9625dee3fb1d212.png!345x210.webp,https://xqimg.imedao.com/16579ff4ed125ce53fe34fe8.png!345x210.webp,https://xqimg.imedao.com/16579ff4eff25ce63fe074a1.png!345x210.webp,https://xqimg.imedao.com/16579ff4ee725e953fe12656.png!345x210.webp,https://xqimg.imedao.com/16579ff4f0325cd93fe211c8.png!345x210.webp,https://xqimg.imedao.com/16579ff50ff25def3fc90170.png!345x210.webp,https://xqimg.imedao.com/16579ff51ae25e963fd4863c.png!345x210.webp","view_count":14641,"created_at":1535350108000,"link_stock_desc":null,"link_stock_symbol":null,"strategy_id":0,"feedback":null,"quote_cards":null,"retweeted_status":null}

{"id":112602327,"title":"重疾险，到底买定期还是终身？","description":"最近后台陆陆续续收到一些重疾险投保的咨询，“重疾险”的必要性已经不言而喻，许多人已经有为自己或者家人搭配一份重疾险的意识，但想要购买的时候却经常被繁多的重疾险种类给吓晕。许多人会纠结买多少保额、买多久的保障期限、要不要买带轻症和中症的等等……这些问题我们之前也都介绍过，想重...","target":"/2003899241/112602327","user":{"id":2003899241,"profile":"/2003899241","description":"","screen_name":"精算师讲保险","profile_image_url":"community/20187/1533277914015-1533277916487.jpg,community/20187/1533277914015-1533277916487.jpg!180x180.png,community/20187/1533277914015-1533277916487.jpg!50x50.png,community/20187/1533277914015-1533277916487.jpg!30x30.png","photo_domain":"http://xavatar.imedao.com/"},"promotion":false,"answers":null,"tag":null,"card":null,"source":"雪球","score":null,"reply_count":0,"retweet_count":1,"topic_title":"重疾险，到底买定期还是终身？","topic_desc":"最近后台陆陆续续收到一些重疾险投保的咨询，“重疾险”的...","topic_symbol":null,"topic_pic":null,"topic_pic_hd":null,"pic_type":0,"first_pic":"https://xqimg.imedao.com/16564b3b6465be13fc68eac8.jpg!186x186.jpg","pic_size":{"width":2,"height":1,"qrcode":false},"pic":"https://xqimg.imedao.com/16564b3b6465be13fc68eac8.jpg!345x210.webp,https://xqimg.imedao.com/16564b3b6575ba93fc9382b9.jpg!345x210.webp,https://xqimg.imedao.com/16564b3b6495c783fbe5362f.png!345x210.webp","view_count":10946,"created_at":1534992903000,"link_stock_desc":null,"link_stock_symbol":null,"strategy_id":0,"feedback":null,"quote_cards":null,"retweeted_status":null}

{"id":112811462,"title":"广汽集团2018年中报点评","description":"上周末在家仔细看了广汽集团的中报，有喜有优。 1、营业收入。2018年上半年广汽集团的合并营业收入367.06元，同比增长5.91%。看广汽财务报表，首先要理解的就是广汽的合并营业收入的组成部分。广汽集团是整体上市的，但旗下的广汽丰田、广汽本田、广汽三菱、广汽菲克的营业收入是不并表的，并表的...","target":"/9206540776/112811462","user":{"id":9206540776,"profile":"/panpan","description":"南京扬帆智盈投资有限公司总经理、投资总监，擅长分级基金套利，2014年进入私募行业以来至今，连续四年获得不错的正收益。目前管理四只阳光私募产品，产品净值见私募排排网http://dc.simuwang.com/company/CO00000DJN.html，其中产品净值均为扣除提成/分红后的净值。私募工场扬帆智盈雪球1号链接为https://xueqiu.com/S/P000353，欢迎关注。","screen_name":"潘潘_策略投资","profile_image_url":"community/20123/1333986446073-20121221.png,community/20123/1333986446073-20121221.png!180x180.png,community/20123/1333986446073-20121221.png!50x50.png,community/20123/1333986446073-20121221.png!30x30.png","photo_domain":"http://xavatar.imedao.com/"},"promotion":false,"answers":null,"tag":null,"card":null,"source":"雪球","score":null,"reply_count":1,"retweet_count":1,"topic_title":"广汽集团2018年中报点评：有喜有忧","topic_desc":"上周末在家仔细看了广汽集团的中报，有喜有优。 1、营业收...","topic_symbol":null,"topic_pic":null,"topic_pic_hd":null,"pic_type":0,"first_pic":"https://xqimg.imedao.com/1657922cdca249cb3fc5fb06.png!186x186.jpg","pic_size":{"width":2,"height":1,"qrcode":false},"pic":"https://xqimg.imedao.com/1657922cdca249cb3fc5fb06.png!345x210.webp,https://xqimg.imedao.com/16579d57aaf257d13fee923f.png!345x210.webp,https://xqimg.imedao.com/1657a12514925ea23fd6b493.png!345x210.webp","view_count":15546,"created_at":1535351643000,"link_stock_desc":null,"link_stock_symbol":null,"strategy_id":0,"feedback":null,"quote_cards":null,"retweeted_status":null}
